title: Integrated Project Manager
content:
Description 
MediaMonks London is looking for a Cross-channel Creative Integrated Project Manager (Films, digital, and e-commerce content creation) to work on one of our largest International Client accounts producing global brand toolkits. 
 
The Role

As a Project Manager, you specialise in stewarding campaigns & projects from initial client briefing through strategic response and development, creative conception and master creation & production. As well as any further adaptations and interactions that are required.
You will work as part of an established, agile team and will be the interface between the client, internal business & production teams and partner agencies. You will be reporting into the programme lead.  
You will have a genuine passion for creativity and innovation – pushing the boundaries and providing solutions that get results.
Campaigns are varied and you will have the chance to work cross-channel - from Film and Stills Production to Digital Design, e-commerce and UX/UI design. 
Your role is to bring a campaign to life managing it through its entire lifecycle. Ensuring everyone is informed and clear on what needs to happen when. 
You will be fully responsible for keeping your projects within budget and timelines and reconciling any productions that your client requires. 

 
Responsibilities

To scope and estimate the work using agreed guidelines and approved rate cards 
For the campaign’s set-up, including resourcing across all internal departments and tracking their utilisation in regular reports  
For creating solid timing plans, which are communicated internally and externally, ensuring all key milestones and dependencies are clearly identified and tracked against, ensuring its timely delivery
Being solution-driven and proactive in managing changes in scope / timing and managing all stakeholders’ expectations accordingly
For creating solid briefs for the in-house production teams ensuring they are clear on requirements
For ensuring all stakeholders are working towards agreed timings and budgets

 
Requirements

For this client-facing role, we’re looking to hire someone with 6+ years Agency experience ideally dealing with global brands. 
Solid understanding of cross-channel creative content production process
You have hands-on experience with producing high end work and an intimate understanding of what is needed to bring an idea to life.
You have demonstrated your ability to execute large-scale campaigns, managing multiple campaigns / projects between multiple stakeholders / teams  
You don’t think in projects but in partnerships, developing client relationships and work-streams miles(tones) ahead.
You are able to quickly fathom a campaign’s challenges and what needs to be achieved allowing you to establish realistic costs and timings.
You are able to build strong relationships with key partners and stakeholders
Your communication skills are excellent, both verbally and in writing
In short, we need a true team player who can successfully manage campaigns across teams, disciplines and time zones.

#LI-FP1About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.

Responsible for resourcing and implementing security controls for your teams processes and systems


Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy
